item.title: Triz-abrasive_Feeder
item.description: [name::abrasive Feeder] [SpocWebEntityId::22491] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-add-functions] To prevent Wear in a Feeder which distributes an abrasive Material, its Surface is made from the abrasive Material.

item.title: Triz-accept-harm
item.description: [name::accept-harm] [SpocWebEntityId::22287] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Convert_harm_into_benefit] Use harmful factors (particularly, harmful effects of the environment or surroundings) to achieve a positive effect.

item.title: Triz-accept-less
item.description: [name::accept-less] [SpocWebEntityId::22271] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Partial,_overdone,_or_excessive_action] If 100 percent of an object is hard to achieve using a given solution method then, by using ‘slightly less’ or ‘slightly more’ of the same method, the problem may be considerably easier to solve.

item.title: Triz-acoustic_Fence
item.description: [name::acoustic Fence] [SpocWebEntityId::22503] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-add-sensor] Replace a physical Fence to confine a Dog or Cat with an acoustic ‘Fence’ (signal audible to the Animal).

item.title: Triz-adding_inert_Ingredients

item.description: [name::adiabatic Operation] [SpocWebEntityId::22469] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-high-speed] Cut Plastic faster than Heat can propagate in the Material, to avoid deforming the Shape.

item.description: [name::Vibrate for flow] [SpocWebEntityId::22451] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vibrate] Vibrate a casting mold while it is being filled to improve flow and structural properties.

item.title: Triz-vibrating_Blades
item.description: [name::vibrating Blades] [SpocWebEntityId::22449] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-vibrate] Electric Carving Knife with vibrating Blades and electric Saw to allow the User to concentrate on Direction.

item.title: Triz-vibrating_Parts
item.description: [name::vibrating Parts] [SpocWebEntityId::22419] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-movability] Abrasively cleaning Parts by vibrating the Parts instead of the Abrasive. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-vibrating_Parts Triz-vibrating_Parts.

item.description: [name::Virtual Reality] [SpocWebEntityId::22496] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-use-copies] Virtual Reality via Computer instead of an expensive Vacation Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Virtual_Reality Triz-Virtual_Reality.

item.title: Triz-Vortex_Strips
item.description: [name::Vortex Strips] [SpocWebEntityId::22390] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-weight-environment] Vortex Strips improve Lift of Aircraft Wings. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Vortex_Strips Triz-Vortex_Strips.

item.title: Triz-Vulcanize_Rubber
item.description: [name::Vulcanize Rubber] [SpocWebEntityId::22538] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-change-flexibility] Vulcanize Rubber to change its Flexibility and Durability. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Vulcanize_Rubber Triz-Vulcanize_Rubber.

item.title: Triz-Water_Curtain
item.description: [name::Water Curtain] [SpocWebEntityId::22523] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-colored-tracer] A Water Curtain to protect Steel Mill Workers from overheating by blocking infrared Rays but not the bright Light from the melted Steel.

item.title: Triz-weight-environment
item.description: [name::weight-environment] [SpocWebEntityId::22255] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Counterweight] To compensate for the weight of an object, make it interact with the environment (e.g. use aerodynamic, hydrodynamic, buoyancy and other forces).

item.title: Triz-weigt-lift
item.description: [name::weigt-lift] [SpocWebEntityId::22254] [TrizPrinciple:: Triz-Counterweight] To compensate for the weight of an object, merge it with other objects that provide lift.

item.title: Triz-weld_Aluminum
item.description: [name::weld Aluminum] [SpocWebEntityId::22490] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-add-functions] To weld Steel to Aluminum, create an Interface from alternating thin Strips of the 2 Materials.

item.title: Triz-Welding_Powder
item.description: [name::Welding Powder] [SpocWebEntityId::22345] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Fragment] Use powdered Welding Metal instead of Foil or Rod to get better Penetration of the Joint.

item.title: Triz-wick_Excess_Solder
item.description: [name::wick Excess Solder] [SpocWebEntityId::22517] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-fractal-surface] Use a porous Metal Mesh to wick Excess Solder away from a Joint. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-wick_Excess_Solder Triz-wick_Excess_Solder.

item.title: Triz-Wing_Shape
item.description: [name::Wing Shape] [SpocWebEntityId::22389] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-weight-environment] Aircraft Wing Shape reduces Air Density above the Wing, increases Density below Wing, to create Lift.

item.title: Triz-Work-Breakdown
item.description: [name::Work-Breakdown] [SpocWebEntityId::22340] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-Partition] Use a Work Breakdown Structure for a large Project. Confidential Links & Embeds: Triz-Work-Breakdown Triz-Work-Breakdown.

item.title: Triz-Worker-Pit
item.description: [name::Worker-Pit] [SpocWebEntityId::22413] [Triz-Principle-Sub:: Triz-limit-changes] Automobile Engine Oil is changed by Workers in a Pit to avoid using expensive Lifting Equipment or unsafe Ramps.
